languages.text: "Человек, занимавшийся безопасностью церемонии, достойно исполнил свой долг. Остальное не существенно".
"The person responsible for maintaining security during the ceremony has carried out their duties adequately. The rest is inconsequential."
languages.original_text: "Человек, занимавшийся безопасностью церемонии, достойно исполнил свой долг. Остальное не существенно".

traits.locale_text: "The person responsible for keeping security during the ceremony has performed adequately. The rest is of little importance."
"The person responsible for keeping security during the ceremony has performed adequately. The rest is of little importance."
"The person responsible for maintaining security during the ceremony has carried out their duties adequately. The rest is inconsequential."
"The person responsible for maintaining security during the ceremony has carried out their duties adequately. The rest is inconsequential."
"The person responsible for maintaining security during the ceremony has carried out their duties adequately. The rest is inconsequential."
"The person responsible for maintaining security during the ceremony has carried out their duties adequately. The rest is inconsequential."

languages.text: 「式典の警備を任されていた者は、職務をきちんと果たしました。それ以外のことは重要ではありません」
languages.original_text: "The person responsible for maintaining security during the ceremony has carried out their duties adequately. The rest is inconsequential."

traits.locale_text: 「式典の警備を任されていた者は、職務をきちんと果たしました。それ以外のことは重要ではありません」

languages.text: "Die Person, die für die Sicherheit während der Zeremonie verantwortlich ist, hat ihre Pflicht angemessen erfüllt. Der Rest ist irrelevant."
languages.original_text: "The person responsible for maintaining security during the ceremony has carried out their duties adequately. The rest is inconsequential."

traits.locale_text: "Die Person, die für die Sicherheit während der Zeremonie verantwortlich ist, hat ihre Pflicht angemessen erfüllt. Der Rest ist irrelevant."

languages.text: « La personne en charge du maintien de la sécurité lors de la cérémonie a assuré ses fonctions de manière satisfaisante. Le reste est sans importance. »
languages.original_text: "The person responsible for maintaining security during the ceremony has carried out their duties adequately. The rest is inconsequential."

traits.locale_text: « La personne en charge du maintien de la sécurité lors de la cérémonie a assuré ses fonctions de manière satisfaisante. Le reste est sans importance. »

languages.text: «La persona responsable de mantener la seguridad durante la ceremonia ha desempeñado su labor adecuadamente. Lo demás es irrelevante».
languages.original_text: "The person responsible for maintaining security during the ceremony has carried out their duties adequately. The rest is inconsequential."

traits.locale_text: «La persona responsable de mantener la seguridad durante la ceremonia ha desempeñado su labor adecuadamente. Lo demás es irrelevante».

languages.text: “颂典期间的安保人员已经充分履行了职责。其他的事情，都是无关紧要的小事。”
languages.original_text: "The person responsible for maintaining security during the ceremony has carried out their duties adequately. The rest is inconsequential."

traits.locale_text: “颂典期间的安保人员已经充分履行了职责。其他的事情，都是无关紧要的小事。”

languages.text: "Tören güvenliğinden sorumlu kişi, görevini uygun bir şekilde yerine getirdi. Gerisi önemsiz."
languages.original_text: "The person responsible for maintaining security during the ceremony has carried out their duties adequately. The rest is inconsequential."

traits.locale_text: "Tören güvenliğinden sorumlu kişi, görevini uygun bir şekilde yerine getirdi. Gerisi önemsiz."
